comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Wife of George Thomas Marye, Jr., Ambassador to Russia. see comments there Another picture of her: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/npc2008000022/ See the article from August 01, 1915 in the Washington herald, p. 23 about her: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045433/1915-08-01/ed-...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Evening herald., September 08, 1915, page 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn99063812/1915-09-08/ed-... indicates that she left again (after coming back as reported in the article cited above) for Russia to nurse wounded Russian soldiers. Similar announcement in NYT of August 27, 1915. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA0A12F63E5D16738...
